Edited September 9, 2016 by Dark Junior

Oh yeah SURE we're supposed to believe that he's a nice person after he bullies his brother the saviour of earth (what were his parents doing anyways why didn't they put a stop to it since it clearly got out of hand?) and then goes and becomes the second best political internet ranter in the world and then BECOMES A CORRUPT SUPREME RULER OF THE WORLD he's literally an embodiment of much of the evil in humanity/10

(heh. Didn't mean all that)

 

I play the video from The Ring on every screen on the planet. That girl's got a lot on her plate now...

1/10. Don't get the reference.

 

I change all media (Yes I mean all of it, books too!) to Tommy Wiseau's "The Room."

1/10 didn't get the reference
Instead of becoming Peter Wiggin, I become Demosthenes

2/10 Don't get it. I think it's a Greek or Roman god though.


TL;DR It's high noon.

6/10 But... But... BEAM! And Mark Watney! And solar sails! Nooooooo

 

I create No Man's Lie 2, with always online DRM, in-app microtransactions, even MORE planets to slow down the game, a Things To Do expansion pack (it's pretty costly!) and the best part: It's all made by EA!

Also, it has no trigger warnings!

4/10 No one would buy it

0/10 Other people start making game companies because EA ran them into the ground.

10/10 RIP Earth.

10/10 Truly evil.

I couldn't think of anything to say.

2/10 It's a little evil to leave me with nothing evil to rate.

I plot and raise money to give to EA so they can buy up every game studio and distributor so they can take over and charge us microtransactions for everything while ruining all our favorite franchises.

ERROR/10 HELP ME!
